CodeExample.Title: Get the TenantDetail's city property
CodeExample.Summary: To get the TenantDetail's city property value, submit an HTTP GET request of the following syntax.
CodeExample.Request: GET /<version>/myOrganization/tenantDetails/<TenantDetail.objectId>/city HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose

Remarks.string: Alternatively, you can use the //myOrganization/tenantDetails/ URL to get the TenantDetail entity first and then parse the result to retrieve the city property value. In addition, you can append the ?$select=city query option to the //myOrganization/tenantDetails/ entity-getting URL to retrieve the city property value
